resources.string: Camp Geiger Activities
Camp Activity Selection

string-array.name: activities
string-array.item: Fish and Wildlife and Forestry MB
Geology and Soil and Water Conservation MB
Swimming and Water Rescue Training MB

resources.string:
Activity: Animal Science MB
Location: Nature Lodge
Time: 11 A.M. / 4 P.M.
Length: 1 Hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Paper and Pencil or Pen, Water Bottle
Costs: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Archaeology MB
Location: Nature Lodge
Time: 10 A.M. / 2 P.M.
Length: 1 Hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Paper and Pencil or Pen, Water Bottle
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Archery MB
Location: Archery Range
Time: 9 A.M. / 11 A.M. / 3 P.M. / 4 P.M.
Length: 1 Hour
For Whom: 3rd year camper or 13 years of age or older
Materials: Arrow Kit, which are available at the Trading Post
Cost: $5.00
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Astronomy MB
Location: Nature Lodge
Time: 9 A.M.
Length: 1 Hour
For Whom: Scouts who have completed the 7th grade
Materials: Paper and pen or pencil
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Automotive Maintenance MB
Location: Handcraft Corral
Time: 9 A.M. / 10 A.M. / 2 P.M.
Length: 1 Hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Paper and pen or pencil
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Basketry and Textile MB
Location: Handicraft Pavilion
Time: 10 A.M. / 11 A.M. / 2 P.M. / 3 P.M. / 4 P.M.
Length: 1 Hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Basketry materials, which are available at the Trading Post
Cost: $10.00
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Beginning Swimmer MB
Location: Pool
Time: 3 p.m. / 4 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: Beginner level swimmers
Materials: Swim trunks and towel
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: The Scout must attain “Beginner” classification during the Sunday swim check. This activity is designed for
Scouts to learn and practice strokes with the goal of advancing to “Swimmer” level.

Activity: Bird Study MB
Location: Nature Lodge
Time: 10 A.M.
Length: 1 Hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Binoculars are highly recommended. Paper and pen or pencil
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: COPE MB
Location: Climbing Tower
Time: 9 a.m.
Length: 3 hours
For Whom: 3rd year camper or 13 years and older
Materials: Closed toe shoes and clothing that can get dirty
Cost: None
Prerequisites: Scouts must be present and participate every day to earn the COPE shirt. Scouts must be mature enough to
handle the safety of others around them.

Activity: Camping MB
Location: Scoutcraft Pavilion
Time: 2 P.M. / 3 P.M.
Length: 1 Hour
For Whom: 2nd year camper and older, preferably First Class rank or higher
Materials: NONE
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Canoeing MB
Location: Lake Front
Time: 9 A.M.
Length: 2 Hours
For Whom: 3rd year camper or 13 years of age and older
Materials: Shoes that can get wet
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: The Scout must attain Swimmer classification during the Sunday swim check. Participants need to be ready to get wet every day.

Activity: Chess MB
Location: Trading Post
Time: 
Length: 
For Whom: 
Materials: 
Cost: 
Prerequisites:

Activity: Citizenship in the Community MB
Location: Eagle training area (Handicraft Bldg.)
Time: 9 A.M. / 2 P.M.
Length: 1 Hour
For Whom: 2nd year camper or older and preferably First Class
Materials: Paper and pen or pencil
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: Visit to a public meeting and community service requirements cannot be completed at camp. Scouts who attend a public meeting before camp should bring a copy of the agenda and be prepared to discuss the meeting. A written note from the Scoutmaster certifying completion of the community service will be accepted.

Activity: Citizenship in the Nation MB
Location: Eagle training area (Handicraft Bldg.)
Time: 10 A.M. / 3 P.M.
Length: 1 Hour
For Whom: 2nd year camper or older and preferably First Class
Materials: Paper and pen or pencil
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: Review the requirements and bring a note from a parent or Scoutmaster certifying completion of the site visits. As time allows, the letter to a Congressman or Senator may be completed at camp.

Activity: Citizenship in the World MB
Location: Eagle training area (Handicraft Bldg.)
Time: 11 A.M. / 3 P.M.
Length: 1 Hour
For Whom: 2nd year camper or older and preferably First Class
Materials: Paper and pen or pencil
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Climbing MB
Location: Climbing Tower
Time: 9 A.M.
Length: 2 Hours
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Closed toe shoes
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: No fear of heights.

Activity: Communication MB
Location: Eagle training area (Handicraft Bldg.)
Time: 9 A.M. / 2 P.M.
Length: 1 Hour
For Whom: 2nd year camper or older and preferably First Class
Materials: Paper and pen or pencil
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: Scouts who attend a public meeting before camp should bring a copy of the agenda and be prepared to discuss the meeting.

Activity: Cooking MB
Location: Sol Hirsh Lodge in Handicraft Corral
Time: 9 A.M. / 2 P.M.
Length: 2 Hours
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: NONE
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: Requirement 5 cannot be completed at camp. A Scout may bring a note signed by his Scoutmaster indicating the meal requirements have been completed.

Activity: Cycling MB
Location: Cycling shed (near Trading Post)
Time: 9 A.M. / 10 A.M. / 11 A.M. / 2 P.M. / 3 P.M.
Length: 1 Hour
For Whom: 3rd year camper or 13 years of age or older
Materials: Personal First Aid Kit, Closed toe shoes, Water bottle
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: ELITE MB
Location: Varies (schedule given at check-in)
Time: 3 p.m.
Length: 2 hours
For Whom: 14 years of age and older and at least a Life Scout, preferably an Eagle Scout
Materials: NONE
Cost: $10.00
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Electricity MB
Location: Basement of Maryville Lodge
Time: 9 A.M. / 2 P.M.
Length: 1 Hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Paper and pen or pencil, water bottle
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: Scouts should wear long pants

Activity: Emergency Preparedness MB
Location: Sol Hirsh Lodge in Handicraft Corral
Time: 11 A.M. / 3 P.M.
Length: 1 Hour
For Whom: 2nd year camper or older
Materials: Emergency Kit
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: First Aid Merit Badge is required and may be taken in the same camp session. Scouts will need to complete the emergency kit before coming to camp.

Activity: Environmental Science MB
Location: Nature Lodge
Time: 9 A.M. / 3 P.M.
Length: 2 Hours
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Paper and pen or pencil
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: Part of this activity requires a nature hike. Wear appropriate closed-toe shoes and bring a water bottle every day of the activity.

Activity: Extra Swimming / Lifesaving MB
Location: Pool
Time: 11 a.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: Scouts needing to complete Swimming or Lifesaving requirements
Materials: Swim trunks and towel
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Fingerprinting & Crime Prevention MB Location: Basement of Goetz Lodge Time: 2 P.M. / 3 P.M. / 4 P.M. Length: 1 Hour For Whom: Any Scout Materials: Paper, pen or pencil Cost: NONE Prerequisites: The Crime Prevention notebook requirement cannot be completed at camp. A Scout may prepare and bring a notebook of newspaper and other clippings that address crime and crime prevention efforts in his community to meet this requirement.

Activity: First Aid MB
Location: Sol Hirsh Lodge in Handicraft Corral
Time: 10 a.m. / 2 p.m.
Length: 1 Hour
For Whom: 2nd year camper and older
Materials: Scout-built personal First Aid kit
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: If a Scout wishes to complete the badge at camp, he must bring the personal First Aid kit he built prior to camp.

Activity: First Class Trail MB
Location: Scoutcraft Pavilion
Time: 9 a.m.
Length: 3 hours
For Whom: Scout Rank or Tenderfoot Rank Scouts
Materials: Sturdy shoes, water bottle, swimming trunks and towel
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Fish and Wildlife & Forestry MB
Location: Nature Lodge
Time: 11 a.m. / 2 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Paper, pen or pencil
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Fishing MB
Location: Lake Front
Time: 9 a.m. period but starts at 8:30 a.m.
Length: 1 hour 30 minutes
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: All fishing gear will be provided
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Fly Fishing MB
Location: Lake Front
Time: 4 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: 3rd year campers or 13 years of age and older
Materials: NONE
Cost: $5.00
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Geology & Soil and Water Conservation MB
Location: Nature Lodge
Time: 11 a.m. / 4 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Paper, pen or pencil, closed-toe shoes
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: This activity does require a nature hike and a conservation project. Please wear closed-toe shoes and bring a water bottle every day.

Activity: Golf MB
Location: Scoutcraft Pavilion
Time: 10 a.m. / 11 a.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: 2nd year camper and older
Materials: Water bottle
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: Requirements involving completing rounds of golf cannot be completed at camp. A Scout can bring a written note from the Scoutmaster or a scorecard from the course to show proof of completion.

Activity: Indian Lore MB
Location: Tipi near Goetz, Swimming Rock Lodges
Time: 10 a.m. / 11 a.m. / 3 p.m. / 4 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: 2nd year camper and older
Materials: Costume kits, which are available at the Trading Post
Cost: Approximately $20.00
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Johnny Fry MB
Location: Cowboy Action Range (initially)
Time: 3:00 p.m.
Length: 2 hours
For Whom: 2nd year camper or older
Materials: Dressing up in Western style is encouraged. 
Cost: $10.00
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Kayaking MB
Location: Lake Front
Time: 10 a.m. / 2 p.m.
Length: 2 hours
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Shoes that can get wet.
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: The Scout must attain “Swimmer” classification during the Sunday swim check. Participants should plan on being in the water every day and should wear appropriate clothing.

Activity: Leatherwork MB
Location: Handicraft Pavilion
Time: 9 a.m. / 11 a.m. / 2 p.m. / 3 p.m. / 4 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Leatherworking kits can be purchased at the Trading Post
Cost: $15.00
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Leave No Trace MB
Location: Nature Lodge
Time: 10 a.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: 2nd year camper or older, any adult leader
Materials: Paper and pen or pencil, Boy Scout Handbook, water bottle
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Lifesaving MB
Location: Pool
Time: 9 a.m.
Length: 2 hours
For Whom: 3rd year camper or 13 years of age or older
Materials: Long-sleeved buttoned shirt, long pants, belt, shoes, socks, swim trunks, towel
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: Scout must have earned Swimming Merit Badge. A 440-yard qualifying swim will be required the first day of the activity, Only strong swimmers will be able to qualify for this badge. Completion of CPR course prior to camp is recommended. There will be CPR training on Thursday night at 5 p.m., but it can be replaced with a CPR training card or other documentation.

Activity: Metalwork MB
Location: Handicraft Pavilion
Time: 9 a.m./10 a.m./11 a.m./3 p.m./4 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: 16 years of age and older
Materials: Jeans or thick cloth pants, closed toe shoes, no nylon or polyester shirts
Cost: $13.00
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Mic-O-Say MB
Location: Council Ring
Time: 1:30 or 2:00
Length: 1.5 hours
For Whom: All Braves, Hardway Warriors, and Tom-Tom Beaters
Materials: Current costume for Mic-O-Say rank when directed to bring it.
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Mile Swim MB
Location: Pool
Time: M-T-W 6 a.m
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: Any Scout of Leader who is a proficient swimmer
Materials: Swim trunks and towe
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: The Scout or Leader must attain “Swimmer” classification during the Sunday swim check.

Activity: Music MB
Location: Trading Post
Time: 9 a.m. / 10 a.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: NONE
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Non-Swimmer MB
Location: Pool
Time: 3 p.m. / 4 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: Non-swimmers
Materials: Swim trunks and towel
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Oceanography & Weather MB
Location: Nature Lodge
Time: 9 a.m. / 4 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Paper, pen or pencil
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Orienteering MB
Location: Scoutcraft Pavilion
Time: 3 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Compass, hiking boots or shoes, water bottle
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Paddle Craft Safety Training MB
Location: Lake Front
Time: Arranged
Length: 3 hours
For Whom: 15 years of age and older
Materials: Shoes and clothing that can get wet
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: The Scout must attain “Swimmer” classification during the Sunday swim check.

Activity: Personal Fitness MB
Location: Sol Hirsh Lodge in Handicraft Corral
Time: 9 a.m./11 a.m./4 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: 2nd year camper or older, preferably First Class or above
Materials: Tennis shoes, paper, pen or pencil
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Personal Management MB
Location: Sol Hirsh Lodge in Handicraft Corral
Time: 10 a.m./2 p.m./3 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: 2nd year camper or older, preferably First Class or above
Materials: Paper, pen or pencil
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Photography MB
Location: Museum
Time: 9 a.m./3 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: 2nd year camper and older
Materials: Sturdy shoes and a water bottle
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: Scouts must earn their Cyber Chip prior to camp and bring documentation to camp. Scouts may bring their own camera but will need to use a provided SD memory card. A cell phone with a camera does not work. A flash drive is needed to take home any pictures taken on camp devices. Pictures taken may be used for the weekly slide show. Scouts will hike to various areas on camp to take photos.

Activity: Plumbing MB
Location: Basement of Maryville Lodge
Time: 3 p.m. / 4 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Paper and pen or pencil, water bottle
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: Scouts should wear long pants.

Activity: Pottery and Sculpture MB
Location: Handicraft Pavilion
Time: 9 a.m. / 10 a.m. / 2 p.m. / 3 p.m. / 4 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Paper, Pen or Pencil
Cost: $5.00
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Radio MB
Location: Front porch of Goetz Lodge
Time: 10 a.m. / 11 a.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Paper, pen or pencil
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Reptile Amphibian Study MB
Location: Nature Lodge
Time: 9 a.m. / 2 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Paper, pen or pencil
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Rifle Shooting (.22 cal) MB
Location: Rifle Range
Time: 9 a.m./10 a.m./11 a.m./2 p.m./3 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: NONE
Cost: $7.50
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Rowing MB
Location: Lake Front
Time: 2 p.m.
Length: 2 hours
For Whom: 3rd year campers or 13 years of age or older
Materials: Shoes that can get wet
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Search and Rescue MB
Location: Scoutcraft Pavilion
Time: 2 p.m. / 3 p.m. / 4 p.m
Length: 1 hours
For Whom: 2nd year or older
Materials: NONE
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Shotgun Shooting MB
Location: Shotgun Range
Time: 9 a.m. / 10 a.m. / 11 a.m./ 2 p.m./ 4 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: Must be 3rd year camper or 13 years of age or older
Materials: NONE
Cost: $15.00
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Space Exploration MB
Location: Nature Lodge
Time: 2 p.m. / 3 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Estes Viking model rocket kit
Cost: $15.00
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Sustainability MB
Location: Nature Lodge
Time: 10 a.m./3 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: 2nd year camper or older
Materials: Paper, pen or pencil
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Swimming MB
Location: Pool
Time: 10 a.m. / 2 p.m.
Length: 2 hours
For Whom: Any Scout
Materials: Swim trunks and towel
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: The Scout must attain “Swimmer” classification during the Sunday swim check.

Activity: Swimming and Water Rescue Training MB
Location: Pool
Time: Arranged
Length: 2 hours
For Whom: 16 years and older
Materials: Swim trunks and towel
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: The Scout must attain “Swimmer” classification during the Sunday swim check.

Activity: Wilderness Survival MB
Location: Scoutcraft Pavilion
Time: 4 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: 2nd year camper or older
Materials: Sleeping bag, clothing suitable to spend the night in the open, pocket knife, survival kit.
Cost: NONE
Prerequisites: NONE

Activity: Woodcarving MB
Location: Handicraft Pavilion
Time: 9 a.m./10 a.m./11 a.m./3 p.m./4 p.m.
Length: 1 hour
For Whom: 2nd year camper or older
Materials: Leather gloves are furnished but Scout may bring his own.
Cost: $5.00
Prerequisites: Scouts should not bring their own knives to the activity. A totin/ chip must be shown to be allowed to use the
tools provided. * The activity fee will be added to the Scout’s camp registration fees, and the materials will be
provided to the Scout during the activity period.
